title: Why rito Why
body: Cmon rito i was about to carry a game as vayne jg and freakin' servers go offline. Cmon rito give me an explanation

replies.body: I wasn't able to find any issues with the NA server, but a new patch did roll out around the time of your post.  Keep an eye out on our [server status page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) to stay updated about downtime, potential issues, and certain queues that will be disabled during that period.
